channel.title: The Voice of Hind Rajab on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Voice of Hind Rajab on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Venice: Kaouther Ben Hania on Gaza Drama ‘The Voice of Hind Rajab’: “At Least, With This Film, I Wasn’t Silenced”
item.description: For her documentary-drama hybrid, the ‘Four Daughters’ director tells the story of six-year-old Hind Rajab, who phoned Red Crescent volunteers from a car in Gaza after her family was killed.
